ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 222
ygData.msgSnippet: Dorn is not a shadowknight, nor is Dvinn. Dorn appears to be a monk for all intents and purposes, and Dvinn acts like a Rogue. I think a lot of the higher
ygData.messageBody:
Dorn is not a shadowknight, nor is Dvinn. Dorn appears to be a monk for all
intents and purposes, and Dvinn acts like a Rogue. I think a lot of the
higher level named NPC's dont conform to PC classes. For instance, I have
heard of NPC's who cast both Wizard and druid spells. But either way,
neither Dorn, nor Dvinn have EVER hit me with Harm touch, and NPC
shadowknights definitely do this


>From: "Omega8" <omega8@...>
>
>
>>Dvinn in Crushbone
>>Dorn in North Ro
>>Gix in West Commons
>>Nixx in Paw
>>Lord Grimlot in South Karana ?
>
>
>These are all, to my knowledge, Dark Elf Shadowknights. Anyone who
mentions
>something about being part of "The Dead" is. Other than the fact that the
>Dark Elves have a known alliance with the Crushbone Orcs, I cant help you
>with the rest... though it seems logical that they also have an alliance
>with the DeathFist orcs and the Gnolls.... it seems to me they have an
>unusally high presence in High Pass as well, which makes me wonder if they
>are conspiring with the leader of High pass? Things that make you go
>Hmmmmm.
>
>Liani
>
